Articles.Content:
After afew hours playing around and 6 designs later.... this is my result: Inception VI

http://s219.photobucket.com/albums/cc310/col2100/?action=view&current=InceptionVI.jpg

Stage 1: 3 SF Rocket Boosters

Stage 2: 3 SF Rocket Boosters

Stage 3: 1 Liquid Fuel Engine + 3 Fuel Tanks.

Stage 1 and 2 are joined to the side of stage 3 via decouplers. I worked out that you could stack adjoining boosters to the sides which significantly improves stability allowing for a reliable 3 stage rocket capable of orbit. It's also really simple to build.

Highest G's Pulled: 6.7

Highest Altitude: 657,982 (Rocket's Alone, not including momentum after rocket burn with capsule alone).

(If you want to build this rocket you have to play around with the staging as the default isn't right).
